ids_info.name: bremsstrahlung_visible
ids_info.description: Diagnostic for measuring the bremsstrahlung from thermal particules in the visible light range, in view of determining the effective charge of the plasma.

=== IMAS DATA DICTIONARY ENTRY ===
FULL_PATH: bremsstrahlung_visible/channel
IDS: bremsstrahlung_visible
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 1

PARENT_CONTAINER: bremsstrahlung_visible
FIELD_NAME: channel
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: bremsstrahlung_visible -> channel

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Set of channels (detector or pixel of a camera)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[bremsstrahlung_visible]: Diagnostic for measuring the bremsstrahlung from thermal particules in the visible light range, in view of determining the effective charge of the plasma.

FULL_PATH: bremsstrahlung_visible/channel/zeff_line_average/validity_timed
IDS: bremsstrahlung_visible
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 3
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 4
PARENT_CONTAINER: bremsstrahlung_visible/channel/zeff_line_average
FIELD_NAME: validity_timed
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: bremsstrahlung_visible -> channel -> zeff_line_average -> validity_timed

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Indicator of the validity of the data for each time slice. 0: valid from automated processing, 1: valid and certified by the diagnostic RO; - 1 means problem identified in the data processing (request verification by the diagnostic RO), -2: invalid data, should not be used (values lower than -2 have a code-specific meaning detailing the origin of their invalidity)

=== CONTEXTUAL HIERARCHY ===
ROOT_IDS[bremsstrahlung_visible]: Diagnostic for measuring the bremsstrahlung from thermal particules in the visible light range, in view of determining the effective charge of the plasma.

FIELD_NAME: validity
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
